title: Ground News - Chairman of the Transport Committee of Deputies: The martyrs of the homeland have drawn the path of the future with their blood
text: Alaa Abed, the chairman of the Transport Committee, praised the efforts of President Abdel Fattah El-Sisi annually to commemorate Martyrs' Day as part of the 39th educational seminar of the armed forces Summary by الوطن 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right [] الوطن Alaa Abed, the chairman of the Transport Committee, praised the efforts of President Abdel Fattah El-Sisi annually to commemorate Martyrs' Day as part of the 39th educational seminar of the armed forces 45 minutes agoRead Full Article Think freely.Subscribe and get full access to Ground NewsSubscriptions start at $9.99/year [Subscribe](/subscribe) Not enough coverage to generate an Article Assistant.
